ValidationRule.description: Restrict Status Updation To Completed before adding Minutes of Meeting.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISBLANK(Meeting_agenda__c ), ISBLANK(Any_other_comments__c ) , ISPICKVAL((Status__c ),"Completed") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status cannot be changed To Completed before adding Minutes of Meeting.
